events.title: Woman bakes expletive-laden pies to ‘get a rise’ out of her grandmother in annual tradition
events.description: “What started as a means to get a rise out of my Grammy has snowballed into a weird family tradition,” wrote Jess Lydon.

events.title: Martha Stewart shows off her 30 pies after canceled Thanksgiving dinner plans
events.description: Queen of Thanksgiving Martha Stewart may not be hosting a turkey dinner this year but fret not, she will still be celebrating with literally 30 pies.

events.title: Burger King is testing a new breakfast sandwich
events.description: This is a win for the flatbread fans.

events.title: Popeyes permanently adds chicken wings to its menu
events.description: And you can get ’em in five different flavors.

events.title: Top salmon with a sizzling mix of aromatics and spices
events.description: Tadka is a ubiquitous South Asian technique that adds a dramatic last-minute coat of flavor.

events.title: 80 Christmas dinner ideas for the ultimate holiday feast
events.description: Build the perfect Christmas menu with these delicious recipes.

events.title: How to make the easiest prime rib roast for the holidays
events.description: Use these tips and tricks to make a juicy and amazingly delicious prime rib roast.

events.title: Turn leftover turkey into a flavorful Waldorf salad
events.description: This light, bright turkey salad is the best post-Thanksgiving lunch.
